title: Our beloved Sharjo ....
body:
He has ascended, he has fulfilled his destiny and now works on the Sharjonic Archive.
Let's all praise him....
HAIL SHARJO!
HAIL SHARJO!
HAIL SHARJO!
THE TRUE LORE-KING OF THESE BOARDS!





(btw the Vastayas look dope)

replies.body: HAIL SHARJO!

https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2014-07/2/17/enhanced/webdr04/anigif_original-grid-image-16944-1404335627-42.gif

ALL HAIL!
I'm a simple person. I see glow cloud, I upvote.
you guys took him from us tho ://
Well we had this Sharjonic Archive, and someone needed to manage it. Who better but the person it was named after?
Teemo.
so what is it
When will Zilean's lore get updated?
Don't praise me you twats I'm the sod who still doesn't know if he's dreaming all of this up yet.
Too late, praising!
Praise to our overlord of lore.

Don't you mean... OverLored?

https://i.makeagif.com/media/7-30-2015/IYwBg4.gif
Tell me there's void lore coming... even if it's a lie just tell me they're not forgotten :(
You think they'd mention something like the "GREAT VOID WAR" and have forgotten the Void?
You've made me a very happy man {{champion:161}}
Yes.
You can't stop me from praising you.
STOP IT. STOP. GAH

Praise the ~~Sun~~ Sharjo!

May the Good ~~Blood~~ Lore guide your way.

Joking aside, you've kept me sated through the recent months of lore-drought. Can't wait to see more.
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/x4lfTc_ZOPg/hqdefault.jpg
Praise the Sharjo!
you've got the touch! you've got the powaaaah!

Say what now?

The dude got hired by Riot?

Really?

Kind of. Apparently Riot is making something to chronicle every piece of lore made, and they are calling it the Sharjonic Archives. He isn't officially a Rioter, but he is working with them, and now knows WAY too much on the entire story of Runeterra. So much, in fact, that he can't talk about the vast majority of it.

So how do we know this? I didn't look very hard to be fair, but don't see any sticky or news post thats all "Coming soon: The sharjonic archives -features the boards own sharjo!" where I'd expect this sort of thing to be.

I mean I suppose it ccould be one of those reddit sourced pieces of info, but as I understand it he's a god of the lore boards, rather than lore god of reddit/other media.
HAIL SHARJO!  1st Ruler of the Sharjonic Archives, LONG MAY HE LORE!
Who's Sharjo wtf?

The board's resident lore nut, to the point of creating an entire thread of lore on everything we learned during the year a few times, as well as posting this kind of stuff within a minute of it releasing (champion voiceovers and teaser videos included)

He apparently was asked by riot to help with an archive of everything the players should and shouldn't know, which is what the Sharjonic archives are.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wWHy9JsA,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-04-04T19:27:23.774+0000)
>
> The board's resident lore nut, to the point of creating an entire thread of lore on everything we learned during the year a few times, as well as posting this kind of stuff within a minute of it releasing (champion voiceovers and teaser videos included)
> 
> He apparently was asked by riot to help with an archive of everything the players should and shouldn't know, which is what the Sharjonic archives are.

Lmao. Damn.
WoW has Warcraft Chronicles, LoL has Sharjonic Archives.
Quick, capture and make him tell us when Sona lore!
